msg.msgText: A method call to set a message property failed because the specified property name is null or is an empty string.

msgExplanation.p: The name for a message property must be a non-null string with a length of at least one character in calls to setBooleanProperty(), setByteProperty(), setDoubleProperty(), setFloatProperty(), setIntProperty(), setLongProperty(), setObjectProperty(), setShortProperty(), and setByteProperty().

msgUserResponse.p: Ensure that the property name is a string with at least one character.
